<h3 id="X34699">X(34699) = CENTER OF THE HR-ELLIPSE OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd ANTI-CIRCUMPERP-TANGENTIAL TO 5th MIXTILINEAR</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^4-(b^2+14*b*c+c^2)*a^2+4*(b+c)*b*c*a-(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(34699) = 2*X(145)+X(6284) = 4*X(1482)-X(6253) = 4*X(1483)-X(11826) = 3*X(3058)-2*X(11113) = 3*X(3058)-X(34689) = 3*X(3241)-X(17579) = 4*X(3244)-X(7354) = 3*X(3244)-X(34637) = 3*X(5434)-2*X(17579) = 3*X(7354)-4*X(34637) = 4*X(11113)-3*X(34606) = 3*X(34606)-2*X(34689) = X(34690)+3*X(34719) = 2*X(34690)-3*X(34749) = 2*X(34719)+X(34749)</b>
<p>
The center of the reciprocal HR-ellipse of these triangles is X(17579)</p>
<p>X(34699) lies on these lines:
{1,34612}, {2,3303}, {7,528}, {12,11235}, {30,7982}, {55,31157}, {56,34607}, {72,519}, {145,529}, {495,31159}, {497,31141}, {517,14855}, {549,34486}, {551,3748}, {943,15998}, {952,34697}, {999,6154}, {1071,28194}, {1259,4428}, {1482,6253}, {1483,11826}, {1750,31162}, {2550,8162}, {3244,7354}, {3295,24953}, {3632,15172}, {3633,15171}, {3656,34746}, {3679,4863}, {3870,34647}, {3871,5433}, {3885,34687}, {3894,28212}, {3902,20336}, {3925,6767}, {4302,34740}, {4421,5298}, {4677,4866}, {4917,25681}, {5288,10386}, {5432,25439}, {5840,34698}, {5842,34617}, {5853,5919}, {6174,10072}, {7173,10528}, {9797,28610}, {10197,24390}, {11238,34619}, {12348,13189}, {12356,13180}, {12648,34717}, {12701,28609}, {13600,28204}, {13996,18391}, {15326,20075}, {15888,17532}, {16189,20420}, {16371,33925}, {24680,28452}</p>
<p>
X(34699) = midpoint of X(145) and X(34611)<br>
X(34699) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3679, 15170), (5434, 3241), (6284, 34611), (28452, 24680), (34606, 3058), (34612, 1), (34689, 11113), (34720, 2), (34746, 3656)<br>
X(34699) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (55, 34625, 31157), (3058, 34689, 11113), (4421, 11240, 5298), (11113, 34689, 34606), (11235, 11239, 12)<br>
</p>
